description: "This guy was very intimidating," says Chris about the toned, tall Kurt. "Long-legs, hairy body, a ton of my fetishes, big dick, nice pecs, great smile. Everything I'm looking for from a partner in crime." Kurt stares at Chris adoringly as the muscular, dark-haired cutie lists off Kurt's best attributes, before countering that Chris is "absolutely adorable. He's definitely really attractive, he's got really good abs" and earnestly adding, "he's really sweet, too, actually." The pair have clearly bonded over their day of working out and watching the surfers together, both of them smiling and eagerly feeling each other's bodies as they share a deep kiss.
title: Chris & Kurt: Bareback
